name: Grow (itch) (TheGenluck)
description:
There is a tree sitting in a field, barren from Fall. It is the dawn of Spring, a time of growth. The tree is besieged by insects, it is a time of growth for them, too. But fear not, for insects attract spiders. Grow this tree to it's full potential.

Switch to fullscreen once the game has started for best experience.

HOTKEYS

1-buy spider

2-buy leaf

3-buy roots

SPACE-pause/unpause

Give Feedback on Ludum-Dare! Or here if you want, doesn't really matter...

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=p...
